God designed to prove His people. His hand covered a mistake in the reckoning of the prophetic periods. Adventists 
                                                                           374
did not discover the error, nor was it discovered by the most learned of their opponents. The latter said: "Your reckoning of the prophetic periods is correct. Some great event is about to take place; but it is not what Mr. Miller predicts; it is the conversion of the world, and not the second advent of Christ." (See Appendix.)
